column4: morning all, I need to fix this resolution:    101x108 dots per inch...it needs to be 101X101...anyone know how to change this?
you can tell the monitor dimensions in the X configuration file so that the DPI will be what you want for the resolution you have (don't remember how, but that's what you might want to do)
'course, for freetype, you can override this from font preferences
heheh...I know that...I just can't find the xserver file
